               int ySize,
               int countOfMines)
        construct a new table with specified properties
        Parameters:
        xSize - horizontal size of new table
        ySize - vertical size of new table
        countOfMines - count of mines of new table

        construct a new table with specified size and generates random number of mines
        Parameters:

      • isMine

        boolean isMine(int x,
               int y)
        Check this field, is this a mine
        Parameters:
        x - table's horizontal coordinate
        y - table's vertical coordinate
        Returns:
        if the field a mine, returns true; else false

        Check this field, is this pushed
        Parameters:

      • push

        void push(int x,
          int y)
   throws FieldIsPushedException,
          FieldIsMineException
        Push the (x,y) field
        Parameters:
        x - table's horizontal coordinate
        y - table's vertical coordinate
        Throws:
        FieldIsPushedException - if the (x,y) field is checked
        FieldIsMineException - if the (x,y) field is mine

      • hint

        IntPair hint()
        Give a hint in the format: (x,y)
        Returns:
        returns a pair. The first is x coord., second is y coord.

        Parameters:

        y - table's vertical coordinate
        Returns:
        number of the mines which is in the neighbour if this element

      • findEmptyNeighbors

        Collection<IntPair> findEmptyNeighbors(int x,
                                       int y)
        Find neighbors of (x,y) witch is not pushed or mine. It will push them and return coordinates
        Parameters:
        x - table's horizontal coordinate
        y - table's vertical coordinate
        Returns:
        coordinates of pushed fields
